# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(str::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    lines = Vector{SubString}(undef, 0)
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(str)
        if length(current_line) + length(word) <= text_width
            current_line *= "$word "
        else
            push!(lines, current_line[1:text_width-1])
            current_line = word
        end
    end
    push!(lines, current_line)
    join(lines, "\n")
end

# 例子
wrap_string("Hello World! This is a test. How are you?") == "Hello World!\nThis is a test.\nHow are you?"
```
